price: ߣߴߊߟߎ߫ ߞߵߊߟߎ߫ ߢߐ߲߰ ߡߐ߰ ߏ߬ ߞߊ߲ߡߌ߬ߘߊ߬ ߸ ߊߟߎ ߟߋ߫ ߓߣߐ߬ߓߊ߮ ߟߎ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߏ߬ ߘߐ߫
arabic: وَلَئِنۡ أَطَعۡتُم بَشَرٗا مِّثۡلَكُمۡ إِنَّكُمۡ إِذٗا لَّخَٰسِرُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wala-in aṭaʿtum basharan mith'lakum innakum idhan lakhāsirūna
